channel.title: Experience Help
channel.description: Okay i need to edit the experience given for certain things. how do i edit the experience? like for a double xp event, or just to raise the normal experience given, like thieving stalls

item.title: Experience Help
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

What should i search if i am changing the experience for thieving?
Would i change it in this? this is in client.java, these are the stalls

if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 40k", 80, 50000*playerLevel[15], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 1k", 1, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 1000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 5k", 50, 300*playerLevel[17], 995, 5000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve 10k", 60, 600*playerLevel[16], 995, 10000, 0x340); }

Read full topic

item.title: Experience Help
item.dc:creator: @xCoDeR_AJ xCoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xCoDeR_AJ wrote:

Broad Statement lol…

if you wanna change xp rates search for “xprate” and change to whatever you like, if it says E.G like (450*hitDiff) means that for every 1 that you hit you get 450 xp, so it you hit a 10 you’d get 4500 xp.

Read full topic
